Sit down with Ramon Guzman and Anthony ‚ÄúChorizo‚Äù Nguyen (The Crazy Gorilla), Jenny Lorenzo (Disney+), Rebeca Huntt (Beba, Hulu), and Katia Castorena (Journalist, ESPN+ Deportes) as they talk about identity, cultura, and familia over a cafecito. entry.title: Talking Zootopia+ with Director Josie Trinidad | What's Up, Disney+

media:group.media:title: Talking Zootopia+ with Director Josie Trinidad | What's Up, Disney+
media:group.media:description:
